name: GROK 4 WACKO EDITION - FULL LOCAL + PREVIEW CONTROL
description: Grok 4 controla localhost, preview y prod. WACKO ES EL REY

tools.name: start_localhost
tools.description: Levanta vite dev server + tunnel publico para que Grok 4 vea localhost
tools.command: npm run dev -- --host & sleep 5 && npx localtunnel --port 5173 --subdomain wacko-complices-conecta

tools.name: deploy_preview
tools.description: Deploy instantáneo a Vercel Preview con URL pública
tools.command: git add . && git commit -m 'preview: wacko-testing-v3.5.1' && git push origin master && vercel --prebuilt

tools.name: full_wacko_deploy
tools.description: Lint 0 + bundle 65MB + deploy prod + notificación México
tools.command: npm run lint -- --fix && npm run build:analyze && git add . && git commit -m 'feat: v3.5.1 OFICIAL by GROK 4' && git push origin master --tags && vercel --prod --force && echo 'WACKO ES MILLONARIO - MÉXICO ES NUESTRO'

tools.name: test_localhost
tools.description: Grok 4 prueba localhost en vivo (OneSignal, PostHog, TikTok, Dark Mode)
tools.command: curl -s https://wacko-complices-conecta.loca.lt | grep -i 'ComplicesConecta' && echo 'LOCALHOST VERIFICADO POR GROK 4'
